modName: Dawnguard and Vanilla Weapons and Armor Exotic Smithing
summary: A collection of armors and weapons with the stats of dragon armor.  Keep the looks and get the stats.
descriptionHtml:
REQUIRES DAWNGUARD DLC! Tired of leaving behind that awesome looking gear just for the stats of Dragon Armor? NO MORE! Get the Armor Value AND the looks! Doesn't replace any armor in game.

CHECK OUT MY OTHER MODS ON STEAM WORKSHOP!
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/Owlburgers/myworkshopfiles/?appid=72850]Owlburgers's Workshop[/url]


What's that weird Smithing Tree photo you see? Hey, it actually looks like and anvil this time. Well those are my changes and additions to the Smithing tree. Now with CLOTH!



SMITHING TREE CHANGE:
Steel Smithing is no longer required to advance into the light armor side (finally). You may also aquire ADVANCED ARMORS after getting Arcane Blacksmithing if you go up the

heavy armor side of the tree. Cloth Weaving was added as a base perk for you mages to smith cloth and can be acquired right away. Exotic Cloth Weaving, Exotic Light Armor and

Exotic Heavy Armor are the perks you need for smithing the following.



ARROWS ADDED: (all values equal to Dragon Arrows and are matched up to craftable exotic sets, Require 100 smithing but no perks.)
Master Assassin Arrows
Dwarven Warrior Arrows
Dwarven Warrior Bolts
Bear Warrior Arrows
Master Thief Arrows
Thick Falmer Arrows
Nightagent Arrows
Cannibal Arrows
Ivory Arrows
Slayer Bolts
Wolf Arrows



HEAVY ARMOR ADDED: (all values equal to Dragonplate Set and can be tempered)
Dwarven Armor + Weapons/Shield (Dwarven Warrior in game)
Dawnguard Armor + Weapons/Shield (Slayer in game)
Falmer Set + Weapons/Shiled (Thick Falmer in game)
Penitus Oculatus Set + Sword/Shield + Greatsword
Steel Plate Armor (Thickened Steel Plate in game)
Companion Armor + Shield (Wolf in game)
Blades Armor Set + Sword/Shield
General Tulius' Chestguard



LIGHT ARMOR ADDED: (all values equal to Dragonscale Set and can be tempered)
Dark Brotherhood Set + Dagger(Master Assassin in game)
Nightingale Set + Sword/Bow/Shield (Nightagent in game)
Forsworn Set + Sword/Axe/Bow (Cannibal Set in game)
Vampire Set + Sword/Dagger (Royal Vampire in game)
Stormcloak Officer Set (Bear Warrior in game)
Thief Guildmaster Set (Master Thief in game)
Snow Elf Set + Bow/Shield (Ivory in game)
Executioner Set + Headsman's Battleaxe (Robes have a bug at the moment that make them look like Dark Brotherhood robes, I'm looking for a fix but it will take some time. I appreciate help with it as well.)



CLOTH ARMOR ADDED: (No tempering available. It's just cloth)
Bar Wench Clothes (not as good looking on Dudes)
Dark Brotherhood Robe Set (Shrouded in game)
Archmage Set (Hooded, Master Mage in game)
Thalmor Set (Hooded, Dark Mage in game)
Mythic Dawn Set
Vampire Set
Chef's Set
Jester Set
Psiijc Set
author: Owlburgers
